review: Dr. Sameer Shrivastva is very well known to me since 1998. I have been consulting him after my CABG  done in June 1998  in Escorts Hospital.

Dr. Sameer is a very important person in my circle.....known to many friends and family members as THE CARDIOLOGIST to go to, one who is an inseparable part of our lives. That he is preeminent in his field, having served humanity for close to four decades in best hospitals in Delhi (last few years as the head of non invasive surgery) is just one small part of why he is such a good doctor. It is his approachability, patient friendly manner and genuine concern for the patient well being and interest that separates him and places him ahead in the pack of luminaries. He is quick in his diagnosis and explaining the treatment choices. Only the other day, Dr. Sameer took just a few seconds in diagnosing an underlying cardiac issue causing falls to my 74 year old friend who was previously hospitalized and being treated by an eminent neurologist for some esoteric neurological conditions!
Though a skeptic in essence, I accept Dr. Sameer word about my disease and treatment as Gospel and actually look forward to my quarterly visits! I have known very few doctors with brilliance in academics, huge experience & international renown display such rare humility and compassion as Dr. Sameer does. Kudos Dr. Sameer...I wish and pray that you keep doing this for aeon! You are a real savior- of both body and soul! Amen!!

Dr Sameer Srivastava  is an experienced  doctor.He is very friendly with patients. He talks with smiling face. He is very cordial in nature. I am under his treatment since July 2018 after my angioplast in Fortis Escorts.God bless him and his family good health and all happiness of Life - üôèüèªRegards-Satish Vats , Ex Dy Gen Secy Syndicate Bank Officers Association
Even accompanied to my next doctor. Took me to balbir singh, his colleague and explained issue as he was expert on that subject.

The Doctor is the only reason my mom is alive and well!
My late mother in law could live for long only because of him! A great doctor and wonderful human! 
Words may not justify what he means to us!
